edu.stanford.math.plex4.streams.impl

Class ExplicitSimplexStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.stanford.math.plex4.streams.interfaces.PrimitiveStream<T>
      • edu.stanford.math.plex4.streams.impl.ExplicitStream<Simplex>
        • edu.stanford.math.plex4.streams.impl.ExplicitSimplexStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AbstractFilteredStream<Simplex>, java.lang.Iterable<Simplex>

    public class ExplicitSimplexStream
extends ExplicitStream<Simplex>
    This class is a wrapper for the ExplicitStream class and provides convenience functions when the base elements are simplices.
    Author:
    Andrew Tausz
